# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Repository: tts-microservices
This repository contains microservices for text-to-speech processing in the 40docs platform.

### Coding Standards
- Use Python or Node.js best practices as appropriate.
- Write unit and integration tests for all services.

### Pull Request Guidelines
- PRs should describe the service or improvement.
- Test services locally before merging.

### Special Instructions
- Do not commit API keys or service credentials.
